name: Shawn HARRIS, Appellant v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee

parties: Shawn HARRIS, Appellant v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 19th day of November, 2014, the direct appeal is QUASHED. The matter is treated as a Petition for Allowance of Appeal, see McMahon v. Pa. Bd. of Probation & Parole, 504 Pa. 240, 470 A.2d 1337 (1983), and is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
103 A.3d 1293
Shawn HARRIS, Appellant v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Nov. 19, 2014.
